Text: Thanks for the upload,...
I wonder how many people think this is Ninja Assassin lol.

I was weary of this movie because of the simple name " Ninja". I actually did enjoy the movie once I watched it though. The story itself wasn't very good, but the action scenes were cool. I totally wish I had that high tech ninja suit haha.
Thanx :) !

Was first thinking: This movie is soo low budget, I mean no famous actors and complete random writing team.
When I saw it: It was pretty damn impressive.
Really violent movie, good effects and tight drama, and killing fighting scenes.
A/V: 9/10, I recommend subs because sometimes you cant hear what they are saying but...
Movie: 8, It really stuns me that it looks really damn good even its budget. Ninja and kungfo fans will love it.
I too thought it was Ninja Assassin

hey thanks much . prolly the 4th time commenting on this for 4 years. 

but this is a really good movie. the action was really moving. didnt think it would be good at all.

I too thought it was ninja assassin and said how corney it was due to my expectations.
realizing that this was NINJA (no assassin) it does qualify for  a good B movie with some (I stress) some good action scenes. 
A=10

IT IS NOT NINJA ASSASSIN

I like Martial Art movies so I thought this was an awesome movie. Great action without all of that herky jerky camera stuff the directors have been shoving down out throats. A10 V10....Thanks for the DL

Nice rip, thanks,
6 mins to download this movie. Excellent speed! I'll continue to seeding while I watch it because i'm so impressed. Thnx for the upload.

Scott adkins! Awesome!

dudes... all ur comments made me download this movie... its crap... u promised good fighting... its crap...CRAP I SAY!! Ninja Assassin is better but even thats slightly crap (the blood is MAJOR FAKE BRIGHT RED)...

I will never listen to comments about a movie ever again =P (on a scale of 1-awesome... its 1... but it is fantastic considering its budget and crappness of movies close to its budget...)
totally worthless movie. the only reason i forced myself to watch it was because i wasted time and bandwidth over it!
good movie.  more should check it out.

good movie.  more should check it out. 80s feel but well done.  check it out.  better than ninja assasin which is kinda childish compared to many fu flix. although i did dig assasin.  just like violence i guess.
xthlon, if you dont like it just say so,n' dont waste your time writing comments that will make some kung fu fan lose interest.
